thread.title: Sam

author: Sam
title: Sam
text:
I am a fairly consistent customer of thriftbooks. I love the prices and the quick shipping and the variety of books and the ease of use of the website.
The only thing I don't like, which I have voiced before...is the sticker on the spine of the book. On paperbacks and certain type of hardcovers removing the sticker also rips off part fo the spine. I don't like the way the sticker looks so I remove them and damage a lot of the covers that way. I'm requesting either a different adhesive that doesn't damage the book or an alternative to putting a sticker on the spine.
